Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING A CERTAIN SUM, OUT OF THE FUNDS IN THE INSULAR TREASURY NOT OTHERWISE APPROPRIATED, FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF THE NEW SOUTHERN ISLANDS HOSPITAL.
Data:
[ Act No. 2261, February 11, 1913 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING A CERTAIN SUM, OUT OF THE FUNDS IN THE INSULAR TREASURY NOT OTHERWISE APPROPRIATED, FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF THE NEW SOUTHERN ISLANDS HOSPITAL.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Legislature, that:
Section 1. The sum of fifty-six thousand and thirty-four pesos and fifty centavos is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, for the maintenance of the new Southern Islands Hospital.(aw√ûhi(
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the same shall take effect on its passage, in accordance with section one of Act Numbered Nineteen hundred and forty-five of the Philippine Legislature.
Enacted, February 11, 1913.
